metadata.name: Metaverse Wedding Invitation
metadata.description:
This NFT is wedding invitation of the first Metaverse wedding hosted by NonFungibleRings & BlockChainWedding.io. Maggie & Jay Sloatman were united in Metaverse marriage in Decentraland on the 15th day of May, 2022. This was probably one the first metaverse wedding in Decentraland. 
Congratulations on collecting historic memorabilia.   


For questions, please contact @NonFungibleRing or @BlockChainWed on Twitter or visit nonfungiblerings.com & blockchainwedding.io

Gift your loved ones NFT Rings: opensea.io/collection/non-fungible-rings-nfr
